deposit(bytes32,uint16).details: This function is called on the destination chain before calling the gateway to execute a source contract.

params.sourceNetwork: The target chain where the contract call will be made

depositOf(bytes32,uint16).details: This function is called on the destination chain before calling the gateway to execute a source contract.

params.sourceNetwork: The target chain where the contract call will be made

submitMessage(address,uint16,uint256,byt.details: Send message from chain A to chain B

params.data: message data with no specified format
params.destinationAddress: the target address on the destination chain
params.destinationNetwork: the target chain where the contract call will be made
params.executionGasLimit: the gas limit available for the contract call

deposit(bytes32,uint16).notice: Pay for gas of contract execution on destination chain.
